title: List of all Android settings  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android settings  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: react-native-android-settings-library
repoList.description: android settings in React Native

repoList.name: AndroidSliderPreference
repoList.description: Android library that allows applications to add dialog-based slider widgets to their settings

repoList.name: ColorPhrase
repoList.description: Phrase is an Android string resource color setting library

repoList.name: MaterialPreference
repoList.description: Library to add material designed Preference/Settings screen to an Android App

repoList.name: EasySettings
repoList.description: A library for easily creating and adding settings (AKA preferences) to your android app

repoList.name: QuickMenu
repoList.description: Small library for creating menus with fast settings

repoList.name: rxkprefs
repoList.description: 🛠 A small Kotlin library to make shared preferences easy + RxJava and Coroutines support

repoList.name: FluentView
repoList.description: Android Library for Setting a View via Fluent Interface

repoList.name: TextViewPlus
repoList.description: an android library for setting custom font in xml layout

repoList.name: android-proxy-changing
repoList.description: Small android library that allows you to change wifi proxy settings programmatically.
